title: I have x3 different pixels and only would work the facebook and messenger lite and not the full ver.
content:
this happens on pixel 3xl, 4 and 5. 
-I uninstalled and reinstalled. 
-Update android and phone platform overall
-Uninstalled all the outdated and unused apps
-Update all the apps
-factory reset and install only facebook

ALL FAILED

SOLUTION: THAT WORKED 100% AND NOW FACEBOOK DOES NOT CRASH

UNINSTALL- Groups
